ai-thag5.4:1.1_0: My mentor helped me to learn,
ai-thag5.4:1.4_0: I’ve done what had to be done.
ai-thag5.4:2.2_0: witnessing it for myself, not based on hearsay.
ai-thag5.4:2.3_0: With purified knowledge, free of doubt,
ai-thag5.4:3.3_0: I’ve realized my own true goal
ai-thag5.4:4.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
ai-thag5.4:5.1_0: You advised me in noble observances;
ai-thag5.4:5.3_0: Your instruction was not in vain—
ai-thag5.4:5.4_0: I, your pupil, am fully trained.
